content: a ***free*** easy-peasy beginner sock pattern for those learning magic loop or for knitters who just want a basic sock pattern it can be customized to your prefered sock length ankle calf etc by adjusting the leg portion of the pattern you will need * 100g of a fingering weight yarn * size 2 25mm-2 5mm needles with a 100cm cord us size 1-1 5 40 in cord * a gauge of 30-32 sts within a 10cm 4 in area **21/02/2025 update a video hyperlink of the magic loop method was added into the pattern for reference **
